owun aanduwen eliyata bahina witama owun dathin bada ganimata pirisak perata paminiyeya.owunge deparshawayema satanpataya wuye mahinda rajapaksha mahatha agamathi kara wima bawa prakasha wiya.anek satan pataya wuye aanduwata thunen deka ahimi kirimayi.mahinda rajapaksha mahatha agamathi kara ho maithri,mahinda samagi kirime yojanawa apa sakachcha karana awadiye eeta payin gasu samaharak nayakayin ada nawatha thama asaranakama wenuwenma ee satana karata gena atha.me aanduwa thula mahinda rajapaksha mahatha agamathi kirima dan yal panagiya satanpatayaki.esema ma danna ganithayata anuwa nam 16 ye kandayama paminimen ahimiwana thunen dekakda natha.eya mema parlimenthuwe sanyuthiya gana awabodhayak nathi ayekuge tharkayaki. 16 ye kandayama samaga dadi prathiwirodhayak sadagena aththe podujana peramunaya.owun idiripath karana kondesi walata 16 ye kandayama ekaga natha.ee wenuwen podujana peramunata ha ehi jathika sanwidhayakawarayata mathaledi dawantha praharayak owun wisin ella karana ladi.namuth dan mahinda rajapaksha mahatha haraha idiripathwa aththeda eeta samana kondesinya.ehidi owun ganna piyawara anuwa apata thawath deshapalana wigrahayak kirima ida salasenawa atha.esema owunda siya aththa aramuna kumakda yanna ratatath janathawatath pasak kara denawa atha ← madhyawedinge jiwtha anathure….

“uthsawa saha sanchara sanwidhanaya karana rajyathanthrikayin (deshiya saha wideshiya) wisin anugamanaya kala yuthu kriyapatipati” pilibanda kal thabime yojanawa garu bimal rathnayaka mahatha wisin yojana karana ladi.
